responses.gpt4: We need to talk about some changes you'll need to make to your medications leading up to your procedure. From your chart, I can see that you're currently on Plavix 75 mg once a day. As per the doctor's instructions, you should have stopped taking this 7 days prior to your operation. Have you already stopped taking your Plavix?
responses.our_model: Wonderful. I see on your chart that you are currently taking Plavix 75 mg once a day. As per the instructions, you were told to stop this medication 7 days prior to the procedure. Have you already stopped taking Plavix?
